item.title: Heliboard
item.description: Jonny had always been curious about open-source technology, so when he heard about the open-source Heliboard keyboard for his phone, he decided to give it a try. The idea of using an open-source keyboard for enhanced privacy intrigued him, promising a level of data security that the default keyboard just couldn’t offer. He eagerly installed it, ready to protect his personal information. However, from the moment Jonny started using Heliboard, things didn’t go as smoothly as he had hoped.
